Package com.fitconnet.service.interfaces.entity

Interface NotificationServiceI

All Known Implementing Classes:
NotificationServiceImpl
public interface NotificationServiceI
Interface for managing notifications.

  • Method Summary

    Method

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      Optional<Set<Notification>> getAll()
      Retrieves all notifications.
      Returns:
      An optional containing a set of all notifications, if any.

    • getByRecipient

      Optional<Set<Notification>> getByRecipient(Optional<User> user)
      Retrieves notifications by recipient.
      Parameters:
      user - An optional containing the user who is the recipient of the notifications.
      Returns:
      An optional containing a set of notifications received by the specified user.

    • getById

      Optional<Notification> getById(Long id)
      Retrieves a notification by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the notification to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An optional containing the notification with the specified ID, if found.

    • existById

      boolean existById(Long id)
      Checks if a notification exists by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the notification to check.
      Returns:
      true if a notification exists with the specified ID, false otherwise.

    • existByDate

      boolean existByDate(Date date)
      Checks if a notification exists for a given date.
      Parameters:
      date - The date to check.
      Returns:
      true if a notification exists for the given date, false otherwise.

    • create

      void create(Notification notification)
      Creates a new notification.
      Parameters:
      notification - The notification to create.

    • delete

      void delete(Long id)
      Deletes a notification by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the notification to delete.

    • update

      void update(Long id, Notification notification)
      Updates an existing notification.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the notification to update.
      notification - The updated notification.

    • patch

      void patch(Long id, Notification notification)
      Partially updates an existing notification.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the notification to update.
      notification - The partial update for the notification.

    • setAttributes

      void setAttributes(Notification notification, Notification newNotification)
      Sets attributes of a notification from another notification.
      Parameters:
      notification - The notification to update.
      newNotification - The new notification containing updated attributes.
